title: General
stimulusHtml:
2 point maximim

Identification (1 point):

  • Inventor of (all) art(s)/skill(s)

  • leader/guide/god of travelers/leader of roads and journeys; Mercury leads/guides travelers, roads, journeys

  • protector of commerce/merchants; Mercury has the greatest influence for (the acquisition of) money and for commerce

Latin words (1 point):

  • inventorem artium

  • viarum atque itinerum ducem

  • ad quaestus pecuniae mercanturasque habere vim maximam OR ad quaestus pecuniae OR ad mercaturas
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

Student response earns one of the available points.
